body_text: English/Latin nitpickery nit: I think you mean "i.e." ("id est", so "that/it is"), not "e.g." ("exempli gratia", so "for example"). In this case, 'privileged' and 'chrome' are the same thing, so one is not an example of the other.
body: English/Latin nitpickery nit: I think you mean "i.e." ("id est", so "that/it is"), not "e.g." ("exempli gratia", so "for example"). In this case, 'privileged' and 'chrome' are the same thing, so one is not an example of the other.
body_html: English/Latin nitpickery nit: I think you mean "i.e." ("id est", so "that/it is"), not "e.g." ("exempli gratia", so "for example"). In this case, 'privileged' and 'chrome' are the same thing, so one is not an example of the other.
